task.summary: Default task
Update project structure
Added amplify, wrote first gridView module snippet. Added less support.
Added 3rd party scripts: amplify, jquery, modernizr
Create messages (=events)
Separated grid view and controller, using messages to render and fill grid.
Extracted splash page from main html script.
Separated and extracted the title page and splash.
Fixed a lot of warnings.
Added stack module
Rearranged model classes
Added game factory
Filling the grid at the start of the level
Allows position filling of central cards.
Connect title page button
Cards can be properly compared now.
Drag and dropping works again, so does the stack.
Cleaned up grid controller.
Added first JsTestDriver test case.
Created a responsive table.
Split responsive behavior into a layout manager module.
Adding the stack to the layout manager.
Cleaned up overlay layer.
Minimized grid size by not showing rows and columns of empty trait borders.
Grid styling
Extracted title page styling
Added transition mixins.
Styling updates.
Use jQuery for the splash and title page
Hide corner cards and give cards a border.
Made DOM follow HTML5 doctype and updated several classes accordingly.
Flipped around cards according to Eyal's wishes.
Touch handler on title button.
Game start grid transition.
Give dragged card a jiggle animation.
Fixed the layout manager to show properly all sizes and ratios of grids.
Cards not fitting in the grid are removed from the stack while playing.
Improvemen of rendering new cards.
Fixed problem that card was not immutable. Now allows for proper 4-card game type.
Drop animation and drop fx.
Fix NPE in resize listener of the grid layout.
Check for a filled grid and animate the grid away when it is full.
First version of a betwixt games view.
Continuous flow of levels with an active betwixt panel.
Fix the grid cell count of a grid with 2 trait directions and properly throw away cards-not-in-grid for such grids.
Add a guid user id
Changed levels object into an array of objects with id and data

Changed levels object into an array of objects with id and data. Removed Card and GameSettings as Objects. Introduced localStorage store for during game events so that player will return to old game if he refreshes.
Clear local storage when the user id changes.
Fix use of mergeCards.
Completed levels are now locally stored.
First implementation of a service to store a user's game events.
Commit user store events to the server and update the local store from the response.
Fetch events from the server when starting up.
Add total and game score.
Improvements on scoring.
Add concept of command bus and make START_NEW_GAME a command.
Make attempt card drop a command. Checking for full grid is handled in the drop card command handler, not in response to listening to a dropped card event.
Make fill position a command.
Got rid of new card in grid or not in grid events, resulting from the dropped card event.
Separated the UI messages from the game messages.
Renamed regular messages to game messages.
Fix several local store errors.
Use closure to fix binding to all game messages.
Fix removing playable card after playing it.
Clean local store when grid is filled.
Fix removing betwixt view.
Fix score view.
Fix loading from the local store.
Fix misdropping cards on an already filled grid cell.
Dynamic parallax background, first iteration.
Fix that card can be dropped in a valid place but that already contains a card!
A level menu, first try.
Towards JSLint compatibility
Towards JSLint compatibility
Towards JSLint compatibility
Fixing bugs related to the previous commits.
Moved images from legacy, moved index.html content.
Moved images from legacy, moved index.html content.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Moved images from legacy, moved index.html content.
